TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit FirstMatchCodeGroup extends System.Security.Policy.CodeGroup
Public NotInheritable Class FirstMatchCodeGroup Inherits CodeGroup
public ref class FirstMatchCodeGroup sealed : System::Security::Policy::CodeGroup

summary.span: 允許由程式碼群組和第一個相符子程式碼群組的原則陳述式聯合定義安全性原則。

span.span: Allows security policy to be defined by the union of the policy statement of a code group and that of the first child code group that matches.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 程式碼群組是建置組塊的程式碼存取安全性原則。Code groups are the building blocks of code access security policy. 每個原則層級是由根程式碼群組可以有子程式碼群組所組成。Each policy level consists of a root code group that can have child code groups. 每一個子程式碼群組可以有自己的子程式碼群組。這個行為會延伸到任何數目的層級，進而形成樹狀。Each child code group can have their own child code groups; this behavior extends to any number of levels, forming a tree. 每個程式碼群組有成員資格條件，可判斷指定的組件所屬是否會根據該組件的辨識項。Each code group has a membership condition that determines if a given assembly belongs to it based on the evidence for that assembly. 成員資格符合指定的組件的唯一程式碼群組和其子程式碼群組套用原則。Only code groups whose membership conditions match a given assembly and their child code groups apply policy. 像任何程式碼群組，其成員資格條件符合的組件的辨識項時才適用。Like any code group, only applies when its membership condition matches evidence for an assembly. 如果沒有相符項目，它會測試每個子系的成員資格條件，順序，第一個相符項目，就會發生時停止。If there is a match, it tests the membership condition of each child in order, stopping when the first match occurs. 結果聯集的根程式碼群組的原則陳述式和原則陳述式符合該程式碼群組的第一個子群組。The result of is the union of the policy statement of the root code group and the policy statement of the first child group of that code group that matches. 僅供以程式設計方式使用應用程式網域主機若要設定網域原則。 is intended for programmatic use by application domain hosts to set domain policy. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用成員的類別。The following example shows the use of members of the class. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Policy.FirstMatchCodeGroup_Evt#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.FirstMatchCodeGroup_Evt/CPP/members.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Policy.FirstMatchCodeGroup_Evt#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.FirstMatchCodeGroup_Evt/CS/members.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Policy.FirstMatchCodeGroup_Evt#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.FirstMatchCodeGroup_Evt/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Security.Policy.IMembershipCondition membershipCondition, class System.Security.Policy.PolicyStatement policy) cil managed
Public Sub New (membershipCondition As IMembershipCondition, policy As PolicyStatement)

param.name: membershipCondition
param.span: 成員資格條件，其測試辨識項以判斷這個程式碼群組是否套用原則。

span.span: A membership condition that tests evidence to determine whether this code group applies policy.

param.name: policy
param.span: 程式碼群組的原則陳述式，形式為要授與符合成員資格條件的程式碼之使用權限集合和屬性 (Attribute)。

span.span: The policy statement for the code group in the form of a permission set and attributes to grant code that matches the membership condition.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會建立基本的程式碼群組，並應從自訂程式碼群組的建構函式呼叫。This constructor creates a basic code group and should be called from the constructors of custom code groups. 可以使用加入子程式碼群組方法。Child code groups can be added using the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼將示範如何使用建構函式。The following code shows the use of the constructor. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for class. summary.span: 製作程式碼群組的深層複本 (Deep Copy)。

span.span: Makes a deep copy of the code group.

returns.span: 程式碼群組的對等複本，包含它的成員資格條件和子程式碼群組。

span.span: An equivalent copy of the code group, including its membership conditions and child code groups.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法也可讓程式碼群組，這表示，它包含的所有物件的複本進行的深層複本。This method makes a deep copy of the code group, meaning that copies of all objects it contains are made, as well. ## Examples 下列程式碼將示範如何使用方法以進行程式碼群組的深層複本。The following code shows the use of method to make a deep copy of the code group. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for class. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.Policy.PolicyStatement Resolve(class System.Security.Policy.Evidence evidence) cil managed

span.span: The evidence for the assembly.

summary.span: 解析程式碼群組的原則和其辨識項集合的子代。

span.span: Resolves policy for the code group and its descendants for a set of evidence.

returns.span: 原則陳述式，包含由程式碼群組使用選擇性屬性授與的使用權限，或為 ，如果程式碼群組無法套用 (成員資格條件不符合指定的辨識項)。

span.span: A policy statement consisting of the permissions granted by the code group with optional attributes, or if the code group does not apply (the membership condition does not match the specified evidence).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定要載入的組件的辨識項，這個方法會評估第一個檢查成員資格條件，針對指定的辨識項的程式碼群組。Given evidence for an assembly to be loaded, this method evaluates the code group by first checking the membership condition against the specified evidence. 如果沒有相符項目，這個方法會傳回程式碼群組，包括評估子程式碼群組的原則陳述式。If there is a match, this method returns a policy statement for the code group, including evaluation of child code groups. 第一個相符的程式碼群組，針對其加入順序; 順序的辨識項測試每一個子程式碼群組成員資格條件只有第一個相符項目已解決的辨識項集合。For first-match code groups, each child code group's membership condition is tested against the evidence in the order in which they were added; only the first match is resolved with the evidence set. 如果沒有相符的項目，適用於父第一個相符的程式碼群組的原則陳述式。If there are no matches, the policy statement of the parent first-match code group applies. 比對的子程式碼群組類型則決定如何套用其下的所有子群組，依據方法，這些子群組的工作。The matching child code group type determines how all child groups under it are applied, depending on how the methods of these child groups work. .NET Framework 安全性系統會使用來判斷哪些權限可授與要載入的程式碼，從產生的原則陳述式和程式碼要求組件上的原則層級上。The .NET Framework security system uses on the policy levels to determine which permissions to grant to loaded code from the resulting policy statements and the code request on the assembly. 這項作業，這個方法是，如下所示：This operation of this method is as follows: 如果成員資格條件不符合指定的辨識項，傳回`null`; 否則設定權限設定為傳回 (P) 等於程式碼群組的原則陳述式，然後繼續。If the membership condition does not match the specified evidence, return `null`; otherwise, set the permission set to be returned (P) equal to the code group's policy statement and continue. 針對每一個子程式碼群組，解決程式碼群組使用相同的辨識項。如果結果不是`null`，傳回該原則陳述式。For each child code group, resolve the code group with the same evidence; if the result is not `null`, return that policy statement. 如果沒有子程式碼群組符合項目，會傳回 P （父系的原則陳述式）。If no child code group matched, return P (the parent's policy statement). ## Examples 下列程式碼將示範如何使用方法來解決程式碼群組原則。The following code shows the use of the method to resolve policy for the code group. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Policy.FirstMatchCodeGroup_Evt#19](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.FirstMatchCodeGroup_Evt/CPP/members.cpp#19)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Policy.FirstMatchCodeGroup_Evt#19](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.FirstMatchCodeGroup_Evt/CS/members.cs#19)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Policy.FirstMatchCodeGroup_Evt#19](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.FirstMatchCodeGroup_Evt/VB/Form1.vb#19)]

exception.span: 一個以上的程式碼群組 (包含父程式碼群組和任何的子程式碼群組) 標記為 。

span.span: More than one code group (including the parent code group and any child code groups) is marked .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.Policy.CodeGroup ResolveMatchingCodeGroups(class System.Security.Policy.Evidence evidence) cil managed

span.span: The evidence for the assembly.

summary.span: 解析符合的程式碼群組。

span.span: Resolves matching code groups.

returns.span: ，是符合程式碼群組的樹狀結構的根 (Root)。

span.span: A that is the root of the tree of matching code groups.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定要載入的組件的辨識項，這個方法會評估第一個檢查成員資格條件，針對指定的辨識項的程式碼群組。Given evidence for an assembly to be loaded, this method evaluates the code group by first checking the membership condition against the specified evidence. 如果沒有相符項目，這個方法會傳回根程式碼群組。If there is a match, this method returns a root code group. 傳回的程式碼群組包含子程式碼群組，也可以有子程式碼群組，以反映一組完整的程式碼群組，以符合所提供的辨識項，視。The code group that is returned contains child code groups, which in turn can have child code groups as necessary to reflect the complete set of code groups that were matched by the evidence provided. 第一個相符的程式碼群組，針對其加入順序; 順序的辨識項測試每一個子程式碼群組成員資格條件只有第一個相符項目已解決的辨識項集合。For first-match code groups, each child code group's membership condition is tested against the evidence in the order in which they were added; only the first match is resolved with the evidence set. 如果沒有相符的項目，適用於父第一個相符的程式碼群組的原則陳述式。If there are no matches, the policy statement of the parent first-match code group applies. 比對的子程式碼群組類型則決定如何套用其下的所有子群組，依據方法，這些子群組的工作。The matching child code group type determines how all child groups under it are applied, depending on how the methods of these child groups work. ## Examples 下列程式碼將示範如何使用方法來解決相符程式碼群組。The following code shows the use of the method to resolve matching code groups. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Policy.FirstMatchCodeGroup_Evt#9](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.FirstMatchCodeGroup_Evt/CPP/members.cpp#9)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Policy.FirstMatchCodeGroup_Evt#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.FirstMatchCodeGroup_Evt/CS/members.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Policy.FirstMatchCodeGroup_Evt#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.FirstMatchCodeGroup_Evt/VB/Form1.vb#9)]
